scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Examples of photographs found in repositories in Houston, including a 1989 photo at Kennebunkport, a photo with George Bush, and a photo of Baker under a President Ford '76 poster. These copies of photographs were found in the University archives in 2019 and added to the papers.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records, transferred to Princeton University in February 2011, contain correspondence, Baker's personal tax returns from the 1950's through the beginning of the Reagan Administration, records of events Baker attended in the 1990s, and records documenting the writing of Baker's memoir.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Most subseries within this series are arranged chronologically; subseries 16C (Memoir research) maintains Darrell Hancock's original order, which organizes materials by chapter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records, from 1993-1999, include both incoming correspondence and (in many cases) copies of outgoing correspondence. This series is arranged alphabetically by year.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection have been maintained in the original order in which they were accessioned.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The files of events include the texts of speeches, email correspondence, programs, and other related documentation for events Baker attended.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection have been maintained in the original order in which they were accessioned. Folder titles have also been maintained.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection have been maintained in the original order in which they were accessioned, as have the folder titles as assigned by Darrell Hancock. Empty folders were discarded. One box of galley proofs for the finished book was removed from this series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes records from Darrell Hancock, a key member of the team that researched and edited James Baker's 2009 memoir, Work Hard, Study... and Stay out of Politics!.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records consist of notes and clippings regarding public relations issues from Margaret Tutwiler to James Baker.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection have been maintained in the original order in which they were accessioned.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This information has been pulled from the larger context of Baker's personal financial records and arranged chronologically.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records of Baker's personal income taxes provide a snapshot of his life as a member of the Houston, Texas legal community from the 1950s through the beginning of his national political career.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These materials were kept in Secretary Baker's desk at the Baker Institute for Public Policy before being sent to the Mudd Manuscript Library. They include letters and notes from former presidents, secretaries of state, senators and first ladies; endorsements from Baker's 1978 Texas Attorney General race; and documents relating to Baker's appointment as Under Secretary of Commerce in 1975.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in chronological order and by correspondent.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of Baker's corresondence with President George H.W. Bush.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The order in which these materials were sent to Princeton has been maintained.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes records from Baker's life after leaving public office, and is closely related to the materials in series 16.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials in this accession have been arranged into two groups: speeches and events. Within those groups, boxes are in no particular order.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes records from Baker's time working with the United Nations Mission for the Referendum in Western Sahara .

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials in this accession have been arranged into three subseries: Correspondence and Reports, Write in Campaigns, and Meeting Notes. The order in which these materials were sent to Princeton has been maintained.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes microfilms of materials in the collections.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Microfilms are arranged by reel number.
